fields.name: title

fields.description: Used for the browser tab title and SEO.

fields.label: Section Title
fields.description: Heading displayed above the events list (e.g. 'Upcoming Events')

fields.name: label
fields.label: Section Title
fields.description: Heading displayed above the contact info (e.g. 'Contact Us')

fields.name: fit
fields.label: Fit Mode
fields.description: How the image fills its container

fields.name: position
fields.label: Position
fields.description: Which part of the image to focus on

fields.name: maxHeight
fields.label: Max Height (px)
fields.description: Optional max height in pixels. Leave empty for auto.

fields.name: label
fields.label: Section Title
fields.description: Heading displayed above the FAQ (e.g. 'Frequently Asked Questions')

fields.name: showPlaceholderLogo
fields.label: Show Placeholder Logo
fields.description: If no logo is uploaded, show the default 'LC' icon?

fields.name: favicon
fields.label: Favicon (Optional)
fields.description: Upload a square image (PNG/ICO/SVG) to use as the browser icon.

fields.name: socialLabel
fields.label: Social Section Label
fields.description: Label shown above social icons in the footer (e.g. 'Follow Us')

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
